about_the_game:
You’re home alone… but are you really alone?

Step into the unsettling world of a teenager left to fend for themselves in a quiet suburban home. With your parents out of town, you expect a peaceful night, but what begins as mundane chores quickly spirals into a harrowing fight for survival.

Key Features:

  • Immersive Storytelling: Experience a suspenseful narrative that unfolds in real-time, keeping you on edge with every step. Each choice you make could mean the difference between life and death.

  • Dynamic Gameplay: No two playthroughs are the same. Necessary items for survival and The Stalker will always spawn in pre-determined random locations to ensure each playthrough is unique.

  • Strategic Survival: Stay sharp and use common sense to outsmart The Stalker. Audio queues are important to uncovering which rooms are safe and unsafe. Pay attention to any clues that there may be someone lurking around the corner.

  • Tense Atmosphere: The comfort of the home will be cut short. Every creak, knock, and distant footstep will keep you on edge.

  • Edge-of-Your-Seat Escape: When the safety of your home is breached, it’s up to you to find a way out. Solve puzzles and avoid deadly encounters to survive the night.

This psychological survival horror game delivers a gripping blend of fear, strategy, and discovery. Whether you’re fortifying your home, searching for vital tools, or making a desperate run for safety, Stalked in Solitude will keep you guessing until the very end.

Are you prepared to face what’s lurking in the dark?

content_descriptors.notes: Minimal amount of profanity. Blood and light gore is a part of the story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 MB available space

short_description: A teenager's quiet night home alone turns into a fight for survival in this psychological survival horror. Scavenge for tools, outsmart a relentless stalker, and make life-or-death choices in a chilling race to escape. Every decision matters—can you survive the night?
